TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CountdownEvent extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 代表當計數到達零時收到訊號的同步處理原始物件。

span.span: Represents a synchronization primitive that is signaled when its count reaches zero.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用`CountdownEvent`:The following example shows how to use a `CountdownEvent`: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CountdownEvent#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.countdownevent/cs/countdownevent.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CountdownEvent#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.countdownevent/vb/countdownevent.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 所有 public 和 protected 成員是安全執行緒，而且用於同時從多個執行緒，但不包括，它必須時，才會使用上的所有其他作業已完成，和，它應該只用於當沒有其他執行緒同時存取事件。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must only be used when all other operations on the have completed, and , which should only be used when no other threads are accessing the event.
CountdownEvent

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 釋放 類別目前的執行個體所使用的全部資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Dispose` 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 之後呼叫`Dispose`，您必須釋放所有的參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體，所佔用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 清除 Unmanaged 資源向上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 `Dispose` 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

span.span: CountdownEvent

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: true 表示釋放 Managed 與 Unmanaged 資源，false 表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同於大部分的成員清單，不具備執行緒安全，而且不能使用與這個執行個體的其他成員同時。Unlike most of the members of , is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會引發事件時在倒數計時達到零。The does not raise an event when the countdown has reached zero. 相反地，屬性等於零，而屬性等於`true`。Instead, the property equals zero, and the property equals `true`.

summary.span: 封鎖目前的執行緒，直到設定了 為止。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until the is set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖，直到目前的執行個體已設定的呼叫端。The caller of this method blocks indefinitely until the current instance is set. 呼叫端會立即傳回的事件是否目前在設定狀態。The caller will return immediately if the event is currently in a set state.

exception.span: 目前的執行個體已經過處置。

span.span: Blocks the current thread until the is set, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the timeout.

summary.span: 取得用來等候事件獲得設定的 。

span.span: Gets a that is used to wait for the event to be set.

value.span: ，其會用於等候事件獲得設定。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應該只用於具有 WaitHandle 依賴的程式碼基底的整合需要它。 should only be used if it's needed for integration with code bases that rely on having a WaitHandle. 如果所有所需等待若要設定，應慣用方法。If all that's needed is to wait for the to be set, the method should be preferred.
